user_persona: A new driver named Alex looking to apply for driving jobs.
user_goal: Alex wants to register an account and then log in to begin applying for jobs.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Registration
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the homepage and clicks the 'Login' link, which leads him to a page with both login and registration options.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Register' option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A registration form appears with fields for email, password, and confirm password, all styled in navy on a white background.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Registration Form
narrative_steps.description: Alex fills out his email and sets a password but mistakenly types a different password in the confirmation field.
narrative_steps.action: Enter mismatched passwords.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A validation message appears below the confirm password field indicating that the passwords do not match.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Valid Registration
narrative_steps.description: Alex corrects the confirmation password and submits the form.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Register' button after entering matching passwords.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system registers Alex successfully and redirects him to the login form with a success message.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Alex enters his newly created credentials and attempts to log in.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in email and password fields and click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Alex is authenticated and redirected to his dashboard where he can start applying for jobs.

user_persona: A registered user, Maria, who just logged in for the first time.
user_goal: Maria wants to create her driver profile by adding personal details and uploading a resume.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Profile Page
narrative_steps.description: After logging in, Maria sees a prompt to complete her profile and clicks on the 'Create Profile' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Create Profile' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Maria is taken to the profile page with editable fields for name, phone number, address, bio, and file uploads.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Profile Information
narrative_steps.description: Maria begins filling in her first name, last name, phone number, and writes a short bio about herself.
narrative_steps.action: Type into the respective input fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each field accepts input normally without error, and the 'Save Changes' button becomes active.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading Resume
narrative_steps.description: Maria clicks the 'Upload Resume' area to attach her latest CV.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the resume upload zone and select a PDF file.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected file is attached and indicated visually next to the upload area.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Profile
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the information, Maria clicks the 'Save Changes' button to finalize her profile setup.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save Changes' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Her profile data is saved successfully, and she receives a notification confirming the update.

requirement_tested: Job posting creation and management by clients
user_persona: A client named Robert who owns a delivery company.
user_goal: Robert wants to post a new job opening for a local delivery driver and later deactivate it when filled.

narrative_steps.title: Creating New Job Posting
narrative_steps.description: Robert logs into his account and navigates to the job management section, then clicks 'Post New Job'.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Post New Job' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A job posting form appears with fields for title, description, location, and salary.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Job Details
narrative_steps.description: Robert fills out the form with the position title, responsibilities, preferred location, and offered salary range.
narrative_steps.action: Complete all required fields in the job posting form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All fields accept valid inputs, and the 'Post Job' button becomes enabled.

narrative_steps.title: Publishing the Job
narrative_steps.description: Once finished, Robert clicks the 'Post Job' button to make the listing live.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Post Job' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The job is successfully posted and now visible under Robert’s active job listings with a green 'Active' badge.

narrative_steps.title: Deactivating Filled Position
narrative_steps.description: Later, after hiring someone, Robert returns to the job management screen and toggles the job status to closed.
narrative_steps.action: Toggle the job's activation switch off.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The job status changes immediately to 'Closed', removing it from public view.

requirement_tested: Job application submission and tracking by users
user_persona: Driver applicant John looking for work opportunities.
user_goal: John wants to apply for a job and later check the status of his application.

narrative_steps.title: Finding a Suitable Job
narrative_steps.description: John browses the Jobs page and finds a delivery driver position that matches his experience.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the job listing card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He is directed to the full job description page with an 'Apply Now' button.

narrative_steps.title: Preparing Application
narrative_steps.description: John clicks 'Apply Now' and writes a personalized cover letter explaining why he's suitable for the role.
narrative_steps.action: Write and submit a cover letter in the provided text area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The text area saves his input, and the 'Submit Application' button activates.

narrative_steps.title: Attaching Resume
narrative_steps.description: Before submitting, John uploads his resume to accompany his application.
narrative_steps.action: Click the file upload button and choose his resume file.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: His resume is uploaded and linked to the application form preview.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Application
narrative_steps.description: Confident in his materials, John clicks the 'Submit Application' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit Application' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The application is sent successfully, and a confirmation message informs John that his application is pending review.

narrative_steps.title: Tracking Status
narrative_steps.description: Days later, John checks his application status through the tracking panel.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Applications Tracker and refresh the list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: His application shows up with a yellow 'Reviewed' badge, indicating progress.

user_persona: A visitor named Lisa interested in general inquiries.
user_goal: Lisa wants to send a question to the recruitment team using the contact form.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Contact Page
narrative_steps.description: Lisa navigates to the Contact page from the main menu to find how to reach out.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Contact' in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She lands on the Contact page featuring a form alongside office details and a map.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Contact Form
narrative_steps.description: Lisa fills in her name, email, subject line, and composes a detailed message about her inquiry.
narrative_steps.action: Enter all necessary contact information and message content.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All fields validate properly as she types, ensuring proper formatting.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: Finished writing, Lisa clicks the 'Send Message' button to dispatch her query.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Send Message' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form clears and a success message confirms receipt of her message.

requirement_tested: About Us page with company information

narrative_steps.title: Reading Detailed Content

requirement_tested: Clients page showcasing client services or testimonials

requirement_tested: Drivers page with driver-related content or profiles

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Driver Profiles

narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She is presented with a responsive card-based grid of driver profiles, each showing name, bio, and avatar.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Specific Skills

requirement_tested: Jobs listing page displaying available positions

requirement_tested: Frontend fetching all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: Developer intern Kevin verifying integration between frontend and backend.
user_goal: Kevin wants to ensure that all frontend components fetch and display real-time data from backend services instead of mocks.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Data Load
narrative_steps.description: Kevin opens the browser console and visits the Drivers page to observe API calls.
narrative_steps.action: Open DevTools and navigate to the Drivers page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Network tab logs show GET requests to `/api/drivers/list` fetching actual driver data.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Dynamic Rendering
narrative_steps.description: Kevin observes how the UI renders driver cards dynamically once data resolves.
narrative_steps.action: Watch component render behavior during data load.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Loading spinners appear initially, followed by seamless rendering of driver profiles retrieved from the server.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Error Handling
narrative_steps.description: To simulate failure, Kevin temporarily disables internet connectivity and reloads the page.
narrative_steps.action: Disconnect from the internet and reload the page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Instead of crashing, the app gracefully displays placeholder messages indicating failed data retrieval.

requirement_tested: Backend connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: System administrator Linda deploying the backend infrastructure.
user_goal: Linda wants to verify that the backend connects securely to the PostgreSQL database using pre-defined environment settings.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Environment Variables
narrative_steps.description: Prior to launching the backend, Linda configures the environment with the exact DB credentials.
narrative_steps.action: Set environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Environment reflects accurate configurations ready for backend initialization.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: With variables set, Linda starts the backend server to initiate the database connection process.
narrative_steps.action: Run the backend startup script.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Console logs indicate successful establishment of a secure connection to the PostgreSQL instance.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Database Readiness
narrative_steps.description: Linda verifies that migrations were executed and tables exist as per schema definitions.
narrative_steps.action: Check database tables and migration status.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Database contains expected tables (`users`, `profiles`, `job_postings`, etc.) with correct structures.

requirement_tested: Package.json configured with npm run install:all for FE & BE installation
user_persona: New developer Mike joining the project team.
user_goal: Mike wants to set up the entire development environment efficiently with one command.

narrative_steps.title: Cloning Repository
narrative_steps.description: Mike clones the repository locally and moves into the project directory.
narrative_steps.action: Clone repo and change directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Project files are present including separate frontend and backend folders along with root package.json.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Without needing to manually go into each folder, Mike runs the unified install command.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run install:all` from root.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed concurrently without errors.

requirement_tested: Package.json configured with npm run dev to start FE & BE concurrently
user_persona: Frontend engineer Anna working on rapid iteration features.
user_goal: Anna wants to launch both frontend and backend development servers simultaneously for integrated testing.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Anna opens the terminal and executes the shared development command from the root directory.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from project root.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Terminal shows both frontend and backend processes starting with distinct port assignments.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Live Reloading
narrative_steps.description: While developing, Anna makes code modifications and watches for automatic reloading.
narrative_steps.action: Modify source code in either FE or BE module.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Changes propagate instantly in the browser or backend responses due to hot-reload mechanisms.
